text: 🔊 Listen up, everyone! The latest #HealthyBottomLine podcast features an enlightening conversation on the importance of preventive medicine with Dr. Rahman. 🩺 Despite its critical role in community well-being, especially during public health crises like Legionnaires' disease and HIV, preventive medicine still struggles for recognition and support. 😷Let's champion the value of preventive care and back organizations pushing for better resources! Together, we can build a stronger, healthier society. 🌍💚
